name: Mulokot
description:
Mulokot About

Mulokot is a simple contemplative game where you explore an area of amazonian rainforest and creek containing a small habitation.

The focus is on the environment, which was built as plausible as possible. It featuring endemic species of French Guiana such as the turtle liana, the cathedral tree or the awara palm tree.
It was designed around the traditional Amerindian tale of the Mulokot water spirit, which lures curious children into the dark water of a creek. The carbet and pontoon are inspired by the ones in camp canopé on the Kourou river.

Credits

This environment was made as a 3D modeling project at IMAC school by Nicolas Senecal & Olivier Meyer
